job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pstrongSite Reliability Engineer SalesforcestrongppstrongRaritan NJstrongppstrongContractstrongppnbspppAs the Site Reliability Engineer you will be supporting a Fortune 50 organization to better run production systems You will work directly with your team to help automate customer solutions and drive change to promote a more reliable Salesforce platform processppnbspppstronguREQUIREMENTSustrongpulliBachelors Degree in Computer Science or related technical fieldliliMinimum of 5 years of experience within site reliability engineeringliliExperience within technologies in the commercial Customer and Sales stack Salesforce Veeva andor MulesoftliliExperience with algorithms data structures and data analysisliliAbility to debug and optimize code and automate routine tasksliliAbility to build foster and handle partner amp customer relationshipsliliExtensive Salesforce experience preferredliulpstrongnbspstrongppstronguRESPONSIBILITIESustrongpulliWork to keep revenue and reputationcritical systems up and runningliliMeasure and monitor availability performance and overall health systemsliliAssist architects and developers to help automate customer issues and drive solutions to build more reliable Commercial Application solutionsliliBuild fix and extend business critical code to improve automationliliEvolve systems by suggesting and implementing changes that approve reliability and velocityliliDevelop software platforms frameworks and Production Readiness reviewsliulpnbspppstrongnbspuWhats in it for youustrongpulliWorking for an international Fortune 50 companyliliAccess to cutting edge technologies in an enterprise environmentliliExposure to highlevel business professionals in a variety of departmentsliliPlay a part in the growth and expansion of a major initiative impacting multiple business unitsliliWeekly Paychecksliul
